content: अवरोहः {@--1@} Descent, going or coming down. {@--2@} A creeping plant winding itself round a tree from the bottom to the top (such as the गुडूची creeper). {@--3@} Heaven (तस्माद्धि भोगावसाने सर्वेऽवरोहंति). {@--4@} Mounting, ascending. {@--5@} A shoot sent out by a plant, a pendent branch, one that strikes fresh roots into the earth, as of the fig-tree (वट); अवरोहशताकीर्णं वटमासाद्य तस्थतुः <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--6@} The growth of a plant or vine. {@--7@} (In music) The descending scale of notes.
